name: Dinner Tonight: Summer Salad with Tortellini
description: In the summer, my cooking seriously improves. As long as I can get to a farmers' market and not mess up royally, dinner doesn't take much more effort than chopping everything up, throwing it into a bowl, and covering with...
recipeIngredient: 1 red pepper, cored, seeded, and sliced into strips
1 small zucchini, sliced into half moons

recipeInstructions.text: 1. Bring a pot of salty water to boil, and cook the tortellini according to package directions. Drain and run cool water over them until room temperature, and pat dry.
2. In the meantime, prepare the pepper, corn, and zucchini, and add to a bowl with the tomatoes. Cover with lime juice and about twice as much olive oil, then season with salt and pepper.
3. Toss the greens and tortellini with the dressed vegetables, top with fresh pepper, and serve immediately.
